thread.title: Manchester United news: Eric Bailly hails Jose Mourinho methods | Metro News
thread.title_full: Manchester United news: Eric Bailly hails Jose Mourinho methods | Metro News

author: Mark Brus For Metro.Co.Uk
title: Manchester United news: Eric Bailly hails Jose Mourinho methods | Metro News
text:
Mark Brus for Metro.co.uk Wednesday 15 Feb 2017 2:26 pm Jose Mourinho has been a big help for Eric Bailly (Picture: Getty) 
Manchester United defender Eric Bailly has heaped praise on manager Jose Mourinho for the work he’s done to help him develop as a player since arriving at Old Trafford. ‘How can Gibbs be captain?!’ Man Utd legend Roy Keane TEARS into Arsenal flops 
The 22-year-old has impressed since his summer switch from Villarreal, looking an astute find by the Red Devils despite not being the biggest name when he first joined. 
United will need Bailly on top form in tomorrow night’s big game against Saint-Etienne in the Europa League, and he spoke to the press ahead of the Ligue 1 outfit’s visit to Manchester. Eric Bailly has proven a fine signing by United (Picture: Getty) 
After his fine start in England, the Ivory Coast international credited Mourinho for working so hard on fine-tuning the details of his game to make him a better performer at this level. 
‘What I’ve found different to other managers is the time he takes to spend time with you individually,’ Bailly said. 
‘He looks at situations in games that happened and takes time to talk through stuff, it’s something that’s been really helpful for me.
